main event: A report of a hole or path 40 ft long, 3 ft wide with burnt metal particles found in a field 15 miles west of Russellville, Alabama on December 2, 1957.
interesting points: The object made a hole in the ground and left burnt metal particles.
The local sheriff was guarding the area until 10:20 PM on December 8, 1957.
An aerial reconnaissance was unable to determine the nature of the object.
The matter was turned over to the 3rd Army for further investigation.
The report was potentially related to Operation 'Pig Iron'.
sighted object: unknown object that created a hole in the ground and left burnt metal particles
